Register.aspx.cs

00001 using System;
00002 using System.Collections;
00003 using System.ComponentModel;
00004 using System.Data;
00005 using System.Drawing;
00006 using System.Web;
00007 using System.Web.SessionState;
00008 using System.Web.UI;
00009 using System.Web.UI.WebControls;
00010 using System.Web.UI.HtmlControls;
00011 using PMT.Controls;
00012 using PMTComponents;
00013 using PMTDataProvider;
00014 
00015 namespace PMT
00016 {
00020     public class Register : Page
00021     {
00022         protected Panel RegisterPanel;
00023         protected Panel StatusPanel;
00024         protected Label StatusLabel;
00025         protected Button SubmitButton;
00026         protected ProfileControl ProfileControl1;
00027     
00028         private void Page_Load(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00029         {
00030             // Put user code to initialize the page here
00031             if (!Page.IsPostBack)
00032             {
00033                 ProfileControl1.AllowChangePassword = false;
00034                 ProfileControl1.AllowNewPassword = true;
00035                 ProfileControl1.AllowChangeSecurity = true;
00036                 ProfileControl1.AllowChangeUsername = true;
00037             }
00038         }
00039 
00040         #region Web Form Designer generated code
00041         override protected void OnInit(EventArgs e)
00042         {
00043             //
00044             // CODEGEN: This call is required by the ASP.NET Web Form Designer.
00045             //
00046             InitializeComponent();
00047             base.OnInit(e);
00048         }
00049         
00054         private void InitializeComponent()
00055         {    
00056             this.SubmitButton.Click += new System.EventHandler(this.SubmitButton_Click);
00057             this.Load += new System.EventHandler(this.Page_Load);
00058 
00059         }
00060         #endregion
00061 
00062         private void SubmitButton_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00063         {
00064             if (!Page.IsValid)
00065                 return;
00066 
00067             // clear the status label and display it, allowing for error messages
00068             StatusLabel.Text = "";
00069             StatusPanel.Visible = true;
00070 
00071             IDataProvider conn = DataProvider.CreateInstance();
00072             //BEFORE WE INSERT ANYTHING, verify email address and username do not exist already
00073             //email address verification
00074             if(conn.VerifyEmailExists(ProfileControl1.Email))
00075             {
00076                 //error out, email already exists
00077                 StatusLabel.Text = "Email already exists.";
00078                 return;
00079             }
00080 
00081             //username verification
00082             //this requires two parts, one to make sure said username does not already exist
00083             //second, make sure said username is not already requested
00084             if(conn.GetPMTUserByUsername(ProfileControl1.Username) != null)
00085             {
00086                 //error out, username already exists
00087                 StatusLabel.Text = "Username Not Available.";
00088                 return;
00089             }
00090 
00091             // insert the new user
00092             PMTUser user = new PMTUser();
00093             ProfileControl1.fillUser(user);
00094             user.Enabled = false;
00095             if (conn.InsertPMTUser(user, new TransactionFailedHandler(this.TransactionFailed)))
00096             {
00097                 RegisterPanel.Visible = false;
00098                 StatusLabel.Text = "Thank you for registering.  Your account will be reviewed soon.";
00099             }
00100         }
00101 
00102         private void TransactionFailed(Exception ex)
00103         {
00104             StatusLabel.Text = String.Format("Registration failed. Error: {0}", ex.Message);
00105         }
00106     }
00107 }
